remarks: Numeration theorem: every set can be put into one-to-one correspondence with some ordinal (using AC).  Theorem 10.3 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 84. (Contributed by NM, 10-Feb-1997.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 8-Jan-2015.)
statement:
numth.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
numth $p |- E. x e. On E. f f : x -1-1-onto-> A $.
$d A f x $.
